title: Vicksburg National Military Park: Legislation
body: Legislation       Establishment Act (February 21, 1899) Memorial Archway (July 11, 1919) Rights-of-Way, VBTCo (March 15, 1928) Easement/Public Highway (April 20, 1928) Donation of Lands (October 9, 1940) Exchange of Land (August 14, 1958) Consolidate VNMP (June 4, 1963) Restoration of Cairo (October 12, 1972) Grant's Canal (May 18, 1990) Pemberton's Headquarters (October 11, 2002)
